alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264 (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 12:19AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact areas from Winslow to Two Guns through 100 AM MST/200 AM MDT/... At 1216 AM MST/116 AM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Winslow, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Winslow, Tolani Lake, Two Guns, Leupp, Sunrise, Rimmy Jims, Meteor Crater, Chevelon Butte and Homolovi State Park Campground. This includes the following highways... Business Interstate 40 between mile markers 252 and 257. Interstate 40 between mile markers 230 and 263. State Route 87 between mile markers 315 and 353. State Route 99 between mile markers 23 and 71. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264
